title: Pokemon XY&Z Specials
synopsis: Professor Sycamore and Alexa explore some ruins, where they discover a stone statue of a woman named Aila, and a legend emerges. A collection of Kalos records reveals that Aila's true love, Jan, attempted to vanquish the Destruction Pok√©mon Yveltal. When he failed, the land was drained of all life as Yveltal became a cocoon and turned Aila to stone.
